entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 3 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
